channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Smart Protection Server (Standalone)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Smart Protection Server (Standalone)

item.title: CVE-2017-14096|2024-08-05T19:20:39.889Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20smart%20protection%20server%20%28standalone%29
item.description: A stored cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Trend Micro Smart Protection Server (Standalone) versions 3.2 and below could allow an attacker to execute a malicious payload on vulnerable systems.

item.title: CVE-2017-14095|2024-08-05T19:20:39.837Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20smart%20protection%20server%20%28standalone%29
item.description: A vulnerability in Trend Micro Smart Protection Server (Standalone) versions 3.2 and below could allow an attacker to perform remote command execution via a local file inclusion on a vulnerable system.

item.title: CVE-2018-6231|2024-08-05T06:01:47.743Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20smart%20protection%20server%20%28standalone%29
item.description: A server auth command injection authentication bypass vulnerability in Trend Micro Smart Protection Server (Standalone) versions 3.3 and below could allow remote attackers to escalate privileges on vulnerable installations.

item.title: CVE-2017-11398|2024-08-05T18:05:30.602Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20smart%20protection%20server%20%28standalone%29
item.description: A session hijacking via log disclosure vulnerability in Trend Micro Smart Protection Server (Standalone) versions 3.2 and below could allow an unauthenticated attacker to hijack active user sessions to perform authenticated requests on a vulnerable system.

item.title: CVE-2017-14097|2024-08-05T19:20:39.884Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20smart%20protection%20server%20%28standalone%29
item.description: An improper access control vulnerability in Trend Micro Smart Protection Server (Standalone) versions 3.2 and below could allow an attacker to decrypt contents of a database with information that could be used to access a vulnerable system.

item.title: CVE-2018-6237|2024-08-05T06:01:47.700Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20smart%20protection%20server%20%28standalone%29
item.description: A vulnerability in Trend Micro Smart Protection Server (Standalone) 3.x could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to manipulate the product to send a large number of specially crafted HTTP requests to potentially cause the file system to fill up, eventually causing a denial of service (DoS) situation.

item.title: CVE-2018-10350|2024-08-05T07:39:08.170Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20smart%20protection%20server%20%28standalone%29
item.description: A SQL injection remote code execution vulnerability in Trend Micro Smart Protection Server (Standalone) 3.x could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations due to a flaw within the handling of parameters provided to wcs\_bwlists\_handler.php. Authentication is required in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-14094|2024-08-05T19:13:41.885Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20smart%20protection%20server%20%28standalone%29
item.description: A vulnerability in Trend Micro Smart Protection Server (Standalone) versions 3.2 and below could allow an attacker to perform remote command execution via a cron job injection on a vulnerable system.
